price: 35. Мре tobimisaki bandimi okati na bango.
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
